title: Las Vegas Ballpark
address: 1650 S Pavilion Center Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89135
icp_evaluation: **Score: 9/10 -** Las Vegas Ballpark is a professional Triple-A stadium with 10,000-15,000 capacity, high attendance (e.g., 650,934 in 2019), 4.8 rating from 2197 reviews, recurring baseball and events in Las Vegas, and professional management by The Howard Hughes Corporation, aligning closely with ICP for large sports venues focused on fan experience and operations[1][2][3][5][8].
